contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|type=animal|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{DISPLAYTITLE:''Anadia'' (genus)}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Anadia'' | image = Anadia ocellata.jpg | image_captation = ''[[Anadia ocellata]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gymnophthalmidae]] | genus = '''''Anadia''''' | genus_authority = [[John Edward Gray|Gray]], 1845 }} '''Anadia''' is a genus of lizards. ==Classification== '''Genus ''Anadia''''' *''[[Anadia altaserrania]]'' *''[[Anadia bitaeniata]]'' *''[[Anadia blakei]]'' *''[[Anadia bogotensis]]'' *''[[Anadia brevifrontalis]]'' *''[[Anadia hobarti]]'' *''[[Anadia marmorata]]'' *''[[Anadia mcdiarmidi]]'' *''[[Anadia metallica]]'' *''[[Anadia ocellata]]'' *''[[Anadia pamplonensis]]'' *''[[Anadia petersi]]'' *''[[Anadia pulchella]]'' *''[[Anadia rhombifera]]'' *''[[Anadia steyeri]]'' *''[[Anadia vittata]]'' {{DEFAULTSORT:Anadia (Genus)}} [[Category:Gymnophthalmidae]] {{Lizard-stub}}
